name: 10 Seconds (itch) (Franketein)
description:
Feel the adrenaline, you have a bomb to deactivate and just 10 seconds to do it. Tic Tac Tic Tac, time is running...

Puzzles:

-Wires: Click the wires one by one but only cut the one in front of the others

-Switches: Turn off all the switches, if you turn on one of them you lose

-Numbers: Click on the squares from the lowest number to the highest
